message: Bob, I'm thrilled to offer you this exclusive product. Considering its rarity and significance, I'm proposing an initial price.
Alice, your product is certainly interesting, but $2500000 is above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
Bob, I appreciate you coming back to me. While I can't go as low as your offer, I'm willing to adjust the price somewhat.

Alice, I understand you have to make a profit, but $2200000 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to pay $1700000.  This is a fair price considering my budget and the value I see in this product. Let's meet in the middle.
Bob, I'm happy we're still talking. Considering your last offer, I'm willing to lower the price a bit more.

Alice, we're getting closer. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $1900000 is still a bit out of my reach. I'm firm on my last offer of $1700000.  I believe this is a fair compromise and we can finalize this deal.
